name: Darwin's Dimension INDEV
description:
Darwin's Dimension is a 3d platformer where Darwin has to save his brother after he was kidnapped.

You have a sword as a weapon and have to collect Crystal Shards, and fight difficult bosses to get Star-Road Pieces which will help you get to the next levels.

This is a INDEV version of the game, and is still being worked on. So if you encounter bugs and glitches, don't get too harsh.
